subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Roger Clemens responded to a two-month-old motion by his former trainer, Brian McNamee, that asked for the dismissal of a defamation lawsuit brought by Clemens.
snippet: Lawyers for Roger Clemens responded to a two-month-old motion by his former trainer, Brian McNamee, that asked for the dismissal of a defamation lawsuit brought by Clemens.
